            <string language="en">Fungi</string>

          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">Explica qué son los hongos, en qué reino se clasifican y cuáles son los tipos más relevantes de hongos.</string>
            <string language="en">Topic explaining what fungi are, in which kingdom they are classified and which are the main types.</string>

            <string language="x-mt-de">Themaerklären, was Pilze sind, in deren

          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Expliquer de sujet ce qui sont les mycètes, dans
lesquels le royaume ils sont classifiés et qui sont les types 
principaux.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Explicação do tópico o que os fungos são, que
no reino são classificados e que são os tipos principais.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Spiegazione di soggetto che cosa i funghi sono, 
quale nel regno sono classificati e che sono i tipi principali.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θέμα που εξηγεί ποιοι μύκητες είναι, σε ποιοι 
βασίλειο είναι ταξινομημένοι και όποιοι είναι οι βασικοί τύποι.</string>
          </description>
